isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - POWER DISTRIBUTION AND GROUND SYSTEM - OPERATION - IGNITION POWER

svcproc.title: IGNITION POWER
svcproc.para: Battery power from the (B1) battery stud is applied to the common terminal (30) of the ignition relay (462)/R1 and to the key switch "B" terminal. With the key switch in the on position, power from the key switch "I" terminal energizes the ignition relay, applying power to the ignition adapters and fuses. With the key switch in the start or ignition position, power is present at the "I" terminal.
